attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I   DO NOT  AGREE TO PAY 245 POUNDS FOR SIA LICENCE  FEE.

70  POUNDS FOR  B PASSPORT FOR 10 LONG YEARS.  SIA LICENCE  FOR 3  YEARS.

50  POUNDS IS MINIMUM

THANK YOU

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
